remarks: Inequality for joins with 2 different atoms under co-atom ` W ` . (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2013.)
statement:
lhp2atnle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhp2atnle.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhp2atnle.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhp2atnle.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhp2atne $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ Q e. A ) /\ ( ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) /\ ( V e. A /\ V .<_ W ) ) /\ U =/= V ) -> ( P .\/ U ) =/= ( Q .\/ V ) ) $.
